name: vscode-diverse-dye
description: 🎨💻✨🌈🖌️🎭 Diverse Dye is a VSC extension that adds a splash of color to your coding experience! With a diverse palette of colors to choose from, you can customize your workspace to suit your mood and express your creativity. This extension offers a variety of brushes and tools that let you paint your code with different strokes and styles. Plus, you can zoom in and out to get a closer look at your work and even annotate your code. Whether you're a designer, artist, or just someone who loves to add a pop of color to their coding, Diverse Dye is the perfect tool for you! It adds an extra bit of excitement and fun to your coding journey. 🎭

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
